name: Make Space (for Breaks)
description: This extension helps you monitor the amount of time you are looking at your screen and reminds you to take breaks.
author: Colin Ulin
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://colinul.in; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; font-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' https://*.gstatic.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' https://*.gstatic.com
